xgui
Class xPanelPrompt

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  xgui.xPanelPrompt
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
xPanelDabc, xPanelDabcMbs, xPanelMbs, xPanelSelect, xPanelSetup
public class xPanelPrompt
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Base class for prompt panels. Provides functions to build forms from text input fields (one column) and buttons (tool bar).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Hans G. Essel
See Also:
Serialized Form
